price: 120. Sheytan isi kataate mага dirab xaganah xagnisaah deedal Qaaguh ken xagnisaah ken duquurusa, Sheytan kalah ken kah xagnisam mali duquurusiyyaa kee malmaalu akke waytek.
arabic: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiduhum wayumannīhim wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
